ascend_skill.desc:
At the start of battle, grant all allies 1 Knight's Protection shield equal to 12% of Ashiya's Defense + 120/240/360 (effect increases at Lv. 1/50/70, respectively).
When an ally with Knight's Protection takes an attack, grant Ashiya 1 Heroism stack (up to 2 stacks in 1 turn). Heroism can stack up to 4 times.
At the start of the turn, if Heroism is at 4 stacks, spend 4 Heroism stacks to gain Garden of Promises and grant Knight's Protection again to all allies.
ascend_skill.name: Noble Knight of Flowers

ascend_skill.desc:
At the start of battle, gain 3 Heroism stacks. Garden of Promises requires 3 Heroism stacks to activate.
Increase party's pierce rate by 20%.
ascend_skill.name: Floriography: Freesia

ascend_skill.desc:
Increase Defense by 15%, damage dealt by 15%, and critical damage by 10% for every Knight's Protection shield. This effect can stack up to 2 times.
When the effect of Knight's Protection ends, restore the targeted ally's HP by 20% of remaining shield.
ascend_skill.name: Floriography: Gerbera

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Frost Vines and Winter Fortress by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Benevolent Iceheart Knight

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: Increase shield granted to party by 30% (lasts for 2 turns).
ascend_skill.name: Floriography: Chamomile

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Hoarfrost Vow and Thief Tactics by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Floriography: Gentian

ascend_skill.desc:
When gaining Garden of Promises, gain Poise for 3 turns.
Poise: Increase the party's critical rate by 15%.
ascend_skill.name: True-Hearted Friendship

highlight_skill.desc: Grant Knight's Resolve shield equal to 59.0%/59.0%/62.7%/62.7% of Ashiya's Defense + 1681/2044/2066/2429 to all allies and decrease damage taken by 31.9%/35.2%/33.9%/37.1% for 2 turns.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Ice damage to the main target equal to 149.2%/164.5%/158.4%/173.7% of Ashiya's Defense, and deal Ice damage to other foes equal to 44.8%/49.4%/47.6%/52.1% of Ashiya's Defense.
97.6%/97.6%/103.6%/103.6% chance to inflict Freeze on the main target, and gain 2 Heroism stacks.
If Garden of Promises is active, increase the main target's damage taken by 2% for every 600 points of Ashiya's Defense (up to 19.5%/21.5%/20.7%/22.7%), but gain only 1 Heroism stack.
normal_skill.name: Frost Vines

normal_skill.desc:
Grant 1 Knight's Protection shield equal to 22.8%/22.8%/24.2%/24.2% of Ashiya's Defense + 650/790/799/939 to 1 ally. Also increase the ally's Defense by 20% of Ashiya's Defense (up to 1220/1345/1295/1420) for 2 turns. If the target granted this effect has more than 60% HP, increase rate to take attacks from foes by 50%.
At the start of Ashiya's next turn, grant 1 Knight's Protection again to the same target. If Garden of Promises is active, increase shield granted from Knight's Protection by 25% for 2 turns.
normal_skill.name: Hoarfrost Vow

normal_skill.desc:
Grant all allies 1 Knight's Protection shield equal to 12% of Ashiya's Defense + 120/240/360 (effect increases at Lv. 1/50/70, respectively) and Knight's Resolve shield equal to 49.2%/49.2%/52.2%/52.2% of Ashiya's Defense + 1400/1702/1721/2024.
Increase all allies' Down Points by 1 and damage dealt by 2.9% for every 300 points of Ashiya's Defense (up to 56.6%/62.4%/60.1%/65.9%) for an additional 2 turns.
normal_skill.name: Winter Fortress

passive_skill.desc: When allies have a shield granted by Ashiya, increase Defense by 24.0% and ailment resistance by 48.0%.
passive_skill.name: Flower Knight's Shield

passive_skill.desc:
While Ashiya is in battle, when an ally uses their ailment resistance to avoid a curse, elemental ailment, or spiritual ailment, grant 1, 2, or 3 buff stacks, respectively.
For each buff stack, increase the targeted ally's damage dealt by 10.0% for 2 turns. This can stack up to 3 times. At 3 buff stacks, also increase critical damage by 20.0% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Flower Knight's Devotion
